attributes.action: allow smoking for performances within the theatre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is against the ridiculous ban on smoking during performances of live theatre.
This is an insensitive ban as people are warned of smoking during performances, and the actor smoking always has the choice not to. If the characters within the play are written to be smoking, the freedom of performance should allow for actord and directors to include it in the performance.
